Funds are available due to execution delays for the Integrated Primary Prevention Workforce (IPPW). This funding will be re-aligned to support other Independent Review Commission on Sexual Assault in the Military efforts. This is a congressional special interest item.

Funds are available due to limited DISA HQ SCIF spaces based on the partial relocation of the Joint Spectrum Center from the David Taylor Research Center to the DISA HQ building at Fort Meade during FY 2024, resulting in lower costs than initially estimated. This reprogramming does not impact the program. This is a congressional special interest item.

Funds are required: to purchase gas and equipment to establish a Mission Critical Military End Use (MCMEU) Hydrofluorocarbon (HFC) repository. Due to EPA mandates, consumption of these gases i is, being phased down through limited production in the U.S. and imports to the U.S., which has significant readiness implications for legacy weapon systems across the military services. Examples of weapon system platforms include fire suppression for tactical/combat vehicles, nuclear aircraft carriers, destroyers, frigates! and aircraft, and air conditioning for marine vessels, joint strike fighters, submarine tenders, aircraft carriers! and guided missile destroyers. This requirement is deferred as part of the FY 24-11 PA Omnibus 2024 Part I; however, sufficient sources were not approved to finance the requirement.
